name: Bama Grim
text: I love this place. A lady and a guy helped me out, both very amazing at customer service and well educated. The majority of products I ordered from online they had at the store. I highly recommend you going to this store. Great products, services and people.

name: Vicki Siler
text: I LOVE this store! The merchandise is cool and one-of-a-kind, and the staff is super friendly and knowledgeable. I love to go in the store just to look around and chat with everybody, but there's such awesome stuff that I almost always end up buying something. Highly recommended for unique apparel and accessories, and their pipes are awesome too! Expect to spend a little money, but the quality and uniqueness of your purchases will make it well worth it. They've got badass stuff you can't find anywhere else in Alabama.

name: Scott Osborne
text: I purchased an easy to use vape for my Dad here a few months ago.  An employee there kindly helped me through the experience.  I really appreciated the help.

name: Matt .Patterson
text: Cool place. Prices are a little high😧😏. Very friendly and knowledgeable staff.

The best as far as knowledge. Full list of items and order sheet of not in stock.
Great people run this place. Very kind and want to help you sincerely.

If you have some quirks and pains and you need a natural way to fight it off, you got to give Ken's a try!! Its much better than getting hooked on prescription drugs and fighting with the insurance companies. Very friendly folks!!! If you need it, they have most likely got it!! Thank you Ken's!!! We'll see you again soon........

Michael and Michelle Shannon aka/ Florida Girl

name: Sherrie Pace
text: I would have shopped here even with the prices being higher than what I found at other health stores in the area but the guy cleaning the door glass was dousing it in so much noxious cleaner that it gave me a headache instantly. So if you are a true Health store you should be worried about the toxic chemicals you are exposing your customers to. Fragrances and cleaning chemicals are nuero-toxic and should be avoided at all costs or at least used as minimal as possible. Please hire in more environmentally responsible cleaning personnel.

text: Very clean place and nice people running it.  Probably all your Hemp needs in one place!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review! Our concept for the store was have a boutique feel where customers would feel comfortable in our store and hopefully would want to return. We are happy that you enjoyed your shopping experience with us and hope to see you again.

text: Helpful and friendly and I love that they carry CBD for dogs.

text: Professional, courteous, and knowledgeable. Wide variety of products to chose from and very reasonable prices! Can't get any better!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your business!

name: Ellen Hartsaw
text:
I highly recommend this shop and these products. It took me a long time to try them for my chronic pain and anxiety as I was highly skeptical. These are much better than prescription drugs. You don’t have after effects and you can’t get an addiction. They truly work.
I have tried almost all of the products. Different items for different problems and also depending on the time of day and where I am at the time determines which product I use. Sounds silly to have them all but I use them for different things. You can’t go wrong with any product you use. Please check out Hemp Roost I Jacksonville, AL. I have shopped at many places and they have the best deals around and always have a special going.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business!

name: Michelle Chesson
text: Hemp roost has been an incredible place to get the items I need for the right price. They are friendly and go out of their way to give you honest advice about what you need. If you have not gone to their store it is a must!!

resp.text: We appreciate you!

name: Pam Maddox
text: This is the best  place for all your hemp needs. Friendly and helpful staff with great prices! Check them out!

resp.text: Thank you!

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words! We always try to ensure that our customers have the best shopping experience possible.

name: Verna Sims
text: I recently stopped smoking and the "edge" and the urges to smoke were weighing heavy on me. I have ordered cbd products online in the past, but I really didn't want to risk waiting on processing and shipping,  so I finally went inside. Needless to say, the quality of the product I bought was the the same as respectable cbd website products, and the price was so much better not to mention so much more convenient. I will definitely go back and try other products.

resp.text: So thankful we could help! We appreciate your business!!

name: ben blackmon
text: James and Mandy are always so friendly and ready to help me when I am shopping at Hemp Roost. They take the time to answer all my questions. Broad selection with everything for me, my family, even our dog.

resp.text: Thank you for being an amazing customer!

name: Canaeka Dunn Wright
text: Very knowledgeable and awesome products, not only for myself, but for my furbabies!!! Best CBD shop in this area!! Highly recommend!! ❣🐕

resp.text: Thank you!!

name: Chastity Waldrop
text: Very friendly, good prices and knowledgeable of CBD. Highly recommend them!!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Danielle Kelley
text: Great service and selection. I'll be back for more!

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Mary Ingram
text: I know it's a little hole in the wall place, but the products and items that they have are completely awesome!  It's much cheaper to get my spices, wheat grass, and smoothie ingredients from here, and I love to support the locals. One of the ladies, Deanna, is really cool.  There was some other lady in there last time that I'd never seen before that was kind of abrasive, but I wouldn't stop shopping there just because of her. Overall, I would still also recommend the store because of the products they have available.

name: Daniel Walker
text: Walking into Pearly's, one is immediately awash in the aroma of the plenitude of spices, herbs, tea, and herbal remedies. Almost as if the outwardly unassuming market has a personal magnetism all to its own, I could not help but develop a fondness for it and have since become a patron thereof.  While I do occasionally have to wait for service, it is usually because the staff are busy helping people who arrived at the store before me. The quality of service, however, is excellent and the staff, though they seem abrupt at first, are more than happy to answer any questions one might have to the best of their ability. The variety of spices and herbs is fantastic and quite comprehensive.  Because the experience--and pleasure--of shopping here is so intimate, I would not recommend it to anyone in a pinch for time; this is a store in which one should savor the shopping experience.

name: Brandon Arrigo
text: Glad we at least have one store like this in Huntsville.  The previous post may not have been happy with the service but try finding an alternative.  There aren't, especially if you want beer making supplies.  The service has always been great for me.

name: Alex McCool
text: First, this rating supplies only to the brewing supplies at Pearly Gates- I have no experience with the "natural/health foods." I am ashamed to call this Huntsville's local home brew shop. Their ingredient selection is small and old.  They only have pellet hops (which they do not keep cold).  They also do not have liquid yeast, and do not refrigerate the dry yeasts that recommend cold storage.  The staff is not at all knowledgeable about beer making, and if you attempt to give superior advice to other customers, the staff will get very defensive.  I would come here only for equipment that I need pronto (you can't wait for an online order).   Get your grains at cost from a local brewery, where the people helping you are master brewers ready to share recipes, advice, and maybe even some hops or yeast. Get any other ingredients from Nashville or Birmingham, where there are real home brew shops.

name: Andrea Phelps
text: Horrible service. Old nasty building. High prices.

name: Carrington White
text: great

name: Ace Wolf
text: We had a a splendid 1st visit. I purchased some oil for my mother. The staff was very informative and helpful.

name: Allison R. Widener
text:
I called to ask about CBD oil for my pup who has cancer. The owner called me back quickly and gave detailed instructions on the products she has and advise on how to use them.
I can tell she takes pride in what she has in the store, and carries top quality product.
Her husband was in the shop when I arrived and was very kind and sympathetic to my situation.

I don't know how much time I have with my furbaby, but if she is still with me in a couple months when the oil runs out, I will definitely return here for more.

Thank you Herbal Toad for all your kindness, and for taking time to explain everything to me.

name: Cathy Green
text: Great customer service!  They helped me track down a stylist from salon who had cut my hair while I was in town for a funeral several years ago.  They walked a couple stores down to their new neighbor, Salon 126, to get me the name and number.  You really went above and beyond!

name: Stephanie Moore
text: It's a awesome place. And you can tell they know what they are talking about.

name: Ashley Malone
text: I absolutely love this place.. Service and Products are Amazing!

resp.text: Thank you, Ashley! We always love to hear when customers are enjoying our products. We would love the opportunity to share your experience with your family and friends, so make sure to bring them in for free samples next time you pay us a visit.

name: Steve Garner
text: Friendly staff and very informative

resp.text: Thank you, Steve, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us such a great review and mentioning our CBD Store in Huntsville! We can’t wait to serve you, your friends, and your family again!

name: Jennifer Lucero
text: My family has been taking St. John's Nutrition's elderberry syrup for quite some time.  Whenever we feel like "something is coming on," we take some elderberry syrup and the next day, we are back to 100%.  In fact, I cannot remember the last time any of us actually got sick with anything.  Not only is the syrup effective, it tastes amazing!  We joke that it's so delicious that we should pour it over vanilla ice cream as an extra treat. :) We have purchased locally-made elderberry syrup in the past, but St. John's syrup is by far our favorite!  We live in California and the shipping from Alabama is surprisingly quick.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Jennifer!  You can put the Elderberry on top of some ice cream.   We won't tell!

name: Kennedy Johnson
text: I have had great experiences with St. John’s for years! Recently, my toddler started having mild congestion. We immediately started with their elderberry syrup, vitamin d3, and P73 oregano oil. Aside from the congestion and mild cough he was absolutely fine. No other symptoms, no fever, and great appetite. On day 3 his breathing seemed a little off so I decided to take him in to the doctor to get him tested for RSV since it has been going around so bad and I wanted to know if that’s what I was dealing with. His O2 was 98 and lungs were perfectly clear. The doctor said she highly doubted that it could be RSV because he was doing so great. His rapid test came back negative in the office. They still swabbed his throat to send to the lab and said they’d call me if it came back with anything. We didn’t get any treatment from the doctor and went home to continue our natural protocol. The next morning he woke up completely fine. Nothing but a small cough every once in a while. The next day I got a call from the doctor saying the throat swab was back and he was positive for RSV. They were going over treatment plans and OTC meds when I told them that he was all better. Apparently it is unusual for a child to recover so quickly and easily from RSV. I’m so thankful for the products that St. John’s Nutrition offers. I also feel extremely blessed to have a nutrition store with such knowledgeable and caring people to help me! They have played such a big part in helping me create strong immune systems for my family and I!

resp.text: Kennedy, that is WONDERFUL!  We get a lot of credit for the things that God put on this earth, but He is the source of all healing and health.   We are so thankful to be able to serve you and your family, and so thankful for the trust that you have placed in us to be able to do so.   We look forward to your now child one day coming in for HIS kids health!

name: Jim Names
text: St. John's Nutrition is an incredible herb and health food store. Their brand is top quality and one of a kind! Staff is fantastic! Service is incredible! Not only that, but Dr Matt StJohn is a VERY knowledgable naturopath. They ship too. 10/10 they hit all the marks! Go check them out!

resp.text: Thanks so much Jim! We appreciate the great review.

name: Brooklyn Whitten
text: Dr. Matt and Debra and the staff at St. John's have absolutely been amazing for our family.  They have the best products, the best and most knowledgeable customer service, and the best CARE that I have ever seen in a business of this kind.   They have been around for over 2 decades, so they are trusted throughout the region.   I am glad I trusted them!

resp.text: Thanks Brooklyn!   You are the best!

name: Katherine Musto
text: David & Teresa are the absolute best!! They have done nothing but help us understand and realize what each and every outstanding product is used for. Me and my husband both have COVID... before I experienced severe symptoms I used elderberry, prescribed by David and Teresa and it has been amazing! Not only has it been amazing but tastes good too! We also are taking Oregano and it’s great as well! I feel all better and haven’t taken any of the medication from the doctors because why not use natural products instead of steroids!! I HIGHLY recommend a visit so St. John’s nutrition!!! My husband is beginning to take it and he feels much better also!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Katherine! We appreciate you.

name: Bethany Down South
text: Top quality products, care, & service! They really take the time to get to know you, & offer the best advise & products for your needs. They treat you like family. Highly recommend St.John’s Nutrition, you won’t find a better group of people or line of products!

resp.text: Thank you Bethany!  It takes good to know good!  We are so excited about your health journey, and are here for you for the long haul!

name: G W
text: You definitely want to visit this store. The owners are very knowledgeable and helped me find the right natural product. They really care and made some great suggestions.

text: Last year pneumonia got hold of me. Dr Matt came to the rescue and told me what I needed. I recovered quickly by comparison. So I have kept it up and have followed the advice of St Johns Nutrition and Dr Matt and have done great during this pandemic. I highly recommend this place for your health needs.

text: Good place for natural healing there is a herbal doctor there he is very good.

resp.text: Thank you Mark for the kind review!  We happen to LOVE our Herb Doctor, but then again, he is my husband so.... We are happy to have served you and look forward to serving you in the future!

name: J Chesnut
text: I am very fortunate to have found St. John's Nutrition.  They have wonderful products that our family uses on a regular basis and shipping is fast as well.  They are very knowledgeable about their products.  We have tried different Elderberry syrups and this is the best tasting syrup we have had.  I am thankful for good quality products that will help our immune system during this time!  I am also thankful for good quality people who not only care about quality products but also the people they sell the products to.  Thank you!

resp.text: Hey Jennifer!   You and people like you are why we are here today!   God bless you and your family, and we hope to be providing you and yours with wellness for many more decades.

name: Sean Isbell
text: I was greeted by David as soon as i walked in the door.He was quick to assist me with all the questions i asked.I was hesitant about explaining my issues with him (especially since it was mental health ussues like anxiety and deppression). He told me about a product Happy now! He told me a story of how it helped someone tremendously. Made me comfortable and important.  Followed up after  i bought it. Happy now works.it took a week to help. I went from sleeping and severely depressed not working to a full time job 40+ hours a week! Awesome store .awesome service!

resp.text: Thanks Sean for sharing your story, not only about our products helping so much, but also for sharing about our staff being so caring and thorough.   Be blessed!

name: Karen Reynolds
text: Friendly service decent price

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Karen!  Our staff is truly something special.  With a combined 130 years in the wellness field, you would think that would be the most impressive aspect of our staff, but it is truly their hearts and care for others that makes them shine.   As for our prices, we do our best to offer the BEST quality at prices competitive with the shops that sell mega corp low quality supplements.   That combined with the very difficult time shops across the world have had getting suppliers to ship, leaves us fighting daily to get the best prices possible.  Thank yoy again for being thoughtful enough to leave the review as well as answering the lady's question about our Covid policy.   That was super kind to say the least.  Come back in and tell us who you are so that we can give you something special for being so special.

name: Carolyn Thomas
text: I love shopping at St John’s!!  David and Teresa are always friendly and very helpful!! The products at St John’s are of the highest quality!!!  Definitely highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Carolyn! We appreciate you so much!

name: Cecil Munroe
text: I have been going here over 3 years for my vitamins/supplements and for Matt's advice and guidance on general health and recommendations, he is the best! Very knowledgeable, nothing artificial, all natural/organic...very friendly staff too! I highly recommend them!

resp.text:
Thanks Butch!  Your support of US has helped lead so many to St. John's and in turn, changed their lives for the better.  Thank you for who you are, how you live, and how much you care for others.

You are an example of the quality of those who have been patrons of St. John's for many years, and are one of my personal favorite people to wait on and deal with!

name: David Mann
text: Incredible staff, top quality products, and an immeasurable dedication and passion to serve the community and beyond!

resp.text: Thanks for the review David! We appreciate you & your passion for great health!

name: James Harrison
text: Very good place to get all of your vitamins also what you need to fight this covid 19.

resp.text: Thank you for the review James! We appreciate you.

name: Grammys Sewing Basket
text: I met Dr. Matt several years ago at the WTBJ radio station at Trinity Baptist Church. He is open and honest with you and welcomes any questions that you may have. When it became apparent that this virus would be around for a while, I contacted Dr. Matt because I knew my immune system was almost non-existent. My family physician had warned me to be extremely careful because I had many pre-existing conditions that would make it very risky for me should I become sick with the virus. In early March of this year at Dr. Matt’s instructions, I began a regime of P73 Wild Oregano Oil, Vitamin D, Zinc, Drs. Immune Forte, Ultimate C, Probiotics, Elderberry Syrup and Life’s Fortune Vitamins. He advised I give my immune system 6-8 weeks to become active again. I soon began to notice small changes in how I felt and one day I suddenly realized I had not used my asthma inhaler or nebulizer since starting the supplements. Normally I catch every little “bug” I’m around and suffer from seasonal allergies and sinus issues. None of that occurred. My doctor even commended me for taking action to improve my immune system and commented how long it had been since I had been on an antibiotic or a breathing treatment. When a considerable number of people around me contracted Covid, including my husband and son-in-law, I never got sick! This was a miracle in itself. My immune system is now healthy and functioning properly thanks to Dr. Matt’s sound advice and the supplements from St. John’s Nutrition. I am a customer for life!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this incredible review!  You deserve a great deal of the credit yourself for having faith, trusting us, and making the decision to improve your health and doing what it took to do so!  YOU put forth the diligent effort and trusted us even when there was very little information at the time supporting our recommendations as there are now.  We want people to know that when times get hard and things are scary that St. Johns Nutrition is there for you.

name: Britney Whitten
text: The best in the area.  This store never closed during the COVID-19 pandemic for even a day and helped thousands in the region prevent contacting it.  Amazing people and products.

resp.text: Thanks Britney!

name: S. Parker
text: St. John’s Nutrition, and the wonderful people who run it are a true blessing. Last month I contacted Dr. Matt because I tested positive for Covid19, which is a devastating and very scary diagnosis when you have Lupus. Dr. Matt immediately gave me his full attention and used his vast knowledge of natural healing to provide me with a plan for recovery using their TOP QUALITY products. While the process itself was no walk in the park, through very specific instructions I was able to heal myself naturally and without complication by using Elderberry, Vitamin C, Zinc, P73 Oil of Orégano, Lobelia, D3 and Beet Root Juice.They truly went out of their way to make sure I had what I needed without running out, they checked in with me multiple times daily, and were always very receptive to my questions. With their expert knowledge And products as a resource,  I look forward to tackling my next obstacle-naturally getting my Lupus under control.

resp.text: "S", YOU are why we exist.   It was our TRUE pleasure to help you (*while of course not making any medical diagnosis or claim to treat, cure, or diagnose :-)  and your daily improvement and your FAITH and strength make you one of the most impressive people that we know.   You are now able to keep up with those boys better, and it will be all that much MORE pleasure to continue to walk with you on your path to wellness!   Thank you for your transparency and love for others to even share this testimony in such a trying time, but we know you did it for others.  Because that is what you do.

name: Ash Chatman
text: Always satisfied with their knowledge and help .

resp.text: Thank you Ash for the kind words!  We appreciate your business and feedback!

name: Pamela Kearley
text: Love the Happy Now. Started feeling a difference after only 3 days.

resp.text: We are so glad it is working well for you!  We appreciate your support and your review!  Happy health!

name: Emi
text: Poor character and business practices. Whoever runs their social media campaigns is combative and aggressive. They leave unfounded negative reviews on businesses that they have never done business with and then lash out about being questioned. Unprofessional at best. Would NEVER Trust them to do business with.

resp.text: Emi, we are sorry that you have had a negative experience online with someone you believe works with us.   We at St. Johns are not aware of this situation, and would love an opportunity to remedy this!

name: Karen Davenport
text: This place is so much more than a health food store, and Dr Matt and Debra are so much more than your average health food store owners.   Dr. Matt has helped me with my personal health for over 10 years, through cancer and heart disease, and I am now CANCER FREE and in my best health in over 30 years.  I thank the Lord for this couple and the people here for changing and SAVING my life..

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words, Karen! We've loved our journey with you and are so happy to see you cancer free and healthy. We're here, so don't ever hesitate to stop by. Thank you. -Matt St. John, Founder

name: David Russell
text: I owe my life to this place and the cool people who run it/work there.   I had stage 4 pancreatic cancer and a host of other issues when I started going to St. John's after hearing Dr. St. John on the radio and the staff has been incredible.  I am not overly religious, but I have trusted them so much that I have had the people there pray for me on two different occasions.   I have been using their B17, Dr's Immune Forte, Reishi Mushroom, Life's Fortune Vitamins, and their CBD oil (The best that you will ever find) for years.    Today, I am CANCER FREE, have been able to get off of disability, have more energy, and my hair even grew back fuller and darker than it ever was!   There are other places to buy herbs and Vitamins, but no place like this one.   I think they have been around over 25 years.   I know it has been at least 15 years that I have been shopping here.   I am VERY thankful for these people and would advise anyone to stop here first for any of your natural products needs.

resp.text: David, it is so awesome to be on this journey of wellness with you!  We are so happy with what God has done in your life and are happy to have been a part of it!

name: Mark Franks
text: St Johns is incredible! They have a product that completely stopped my morning back pain! I also purchased their Oregano oil for an ear ache / sinus problem & after 5 days it was cured!!! Five stars!!!

resp.text: Thanks Mark!   We truly appreciate your kind words, and your years of patronage.  It's awesome people like you thst make what we do an incredible blessing.   You are not a customer, but a friend and a brother in Christ!

name: Kellee Christian
text: So thankful to find  “Happy Now “! It has helped me through a difficult time with my anxiety and just overall feeling better .  I love the natural benefits and will be a long time customer!

resp.text: Hey Kellee, you have been such a blessing to us as a customer and friend.  We are so happy that our paths crossed and that God has used us to bless each other!

name: Jennifer Barrentine
text: Matt and Debra are truly there to help each and every person they encounter. They have helped me and my family more times than I can count.

resp.text: We're happy to help, Jennifer! You and your family have been such an incredible blessing to ours, and we will be here for you now and in the future!-Matt and Debra St. John, Founder

name: Avery Whitecotton
text: Very friendly staff!

resp.text: Thank you Avery!  We work hard to provide our customers with the information they need and LOVE what we do!  That makes a difference!   Thank you for your kind words and patronage!

name: Matt St. John
text: Committed to being the most knowledgeable and helpful store and wellness clinic in the region!

resp.text: Thanks for your support, Matt! We're here for you. -Ali Randall, associate

name: Mary Young
text: I have enjoyed the truvision product that helped me lose 35 pounds in less than 10 months I love that clean feeling and I feel better everyday.The product trufix and trucontrol really worked great for me.

resp.text: Thanks Mary!!

name: Debra Whitten
text: A health food store with a Naturopathic Doctor, a friendly and helpful staff, custom compounding, and has been open for over 20 years?  Yes please :-)

resp.text: We're happy to have you as part of our community, Debra! Looking forward to seeing you again soon. -Matt St. John, Founder

name: Cathy Wright
text: Amazing quality products that truly have changed my life! Thank you!!

resp.text: We appreciate your support, Cathy!   We love you and your family!  Come to visit us again soon. -Matt St. John, Founder

name: Dr. Matt and Debra St. John
text: Naturopathic health care!

resp.text: Thanks for your support! Come back and visit us again soon. -Ali Randall, associate

name: Tess S. Scott
text: Awesome  place !!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Tess!  You're an awesome customer!

name: Rickey Hogan
text: Always friendly service and help great selection of vitamins and herbs.

name: Angelia Tucker Wilemon
text: Great place to buy herbal supplements.   All natural.  Better for you to take.

name: Bryan Blackwell
text: Amazing staff, kind and knowledgable.  Highly recommend Herb Shop for all vitamins and supplements. Don't go anyplace else!!!

name: Tracy
text: The lady that runs the store has always been so helpful..

name: Richard Harris
text: Well knowledgeable and trustworthy. The team at the herb shop provide the best products for holistic health.

name: Crystal Taylor
text: I love Loretta & Edwin! They are such great people that are very knowledgeable on the perfect herbals for any condition!

name: seven 7
text: I didn't find the "herbs" i was looking for here.

name: Mark McCay
text: Good selection, helpfull staff!!!

name: A Rose
text: I was so disappointed  that the Athens location closed. This is the closest to me and they didn't have Tudca, but hopefully they will stock it soon. We had to drive to the parkway store to get it. The girl in the shop was very nice and helpful.

resp.text: We were disappointed about the Athens store too :( Thank you for your continued support. We'll make sure to stock some more Tudca!

name: April Zook
text: Mrs. Connie is amazing and helpful and enthusiastic!  She will help you find whatever you need.  She’ll encourage you to try different things and she’ll do research to help.  Such a great store!

resp.text: Hey April, thank you for the kind words about Connie and our store! We appreciate your business :)

name: Brooks Hamer
text: The Madison store is my absolute favorite store!! Connie is out of this world amazing and always goes above and beyond. However .... The selection at this location has been dwindling and it is rather disappointing!! I've been in several times to get my normal items and have found them not to be here.  Madison is my location and driving completely across town to get my products is not enticing.  Love the owners and always send people here to support local. Would like to see our selection back up at our Madison location.

resp.text: Hello Brooks, thanks for the kind words about Connie! Our company has switched over to new software that has drastically screwed up our inventory. We're working very hard to try and correct the issues and get our stores back up to stock! We're sorry for any inconvenience this has caused, thank you for your business!

name: Kim Ziehlke
text: We like to support locally owned businesses and this family is well versed in vitamins and supplements, and have a very friendly staff.  They stock large bottles of Cha water suited for water coolers.  Convenient access for a quick stop, both stores have loading by the door, for easy access.  Cha is filter and alkaline balanced water.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Kim, we appreciate your business :)

name: Lauren Self
text: Great selection and helpful employees.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback Lauren, we appreciate it :)

name: MarLa Davidson
text: Wonderful selection of natural, organic items! The staff is always helpful, especially when asking about the products and deciding the item that best meets my needs. The staff knows about the items they sale! If they don't carry an item, they will gladly order it and stock it! It's a small store where I can get in and get out fast!

name: Nicholas Nicholas
text: Good products ....best natural local honey!!

name: Charlotte M. Ellett (Charlaxy)
text: Decent selection, helpful staff. Location is a little tricky to leave due to the split highway.

name: Alisha Miles
text: Delicious doesn't begin to describe the food. We ordered lunch and dinner to-go as we were passing through the town. The Kale wrap and Jack fruit BBQ sandwich are our top picks. Not only does this place offer amazing food, they are in this specific location to give back to their home community by offering healthy food. A great mission accompanied by delicious food and awesome service. I will be back soon even if I have to drive out of the way.... I may even plan a trip just to eat here again!

name: Duzle
text: The café itself is quaint and chill, and the lady who runs it is charming and lively! Street parking. The location is within their home community, to which they wish to give back by providing a healthy alternative such as this. I had the "millionaire 'burger'" along with sweet potato fries - quite tasty! It was piled high with veggies, avocado, and other add-ons. The burger look and texture was great. As usual with meat substitutes, you must treat it as a new kind of "meat" rather than compare it to actual beef. If you do this and let it stand on its own, this burger (along with other substitutes) tastes great. Next time I'm here, I want to try the jackfruit "pulled pork" and possibly a smoothie. This was my first vegan restaurant experience and it was quite lovely! Highly recommended for those hesitant on exploring this new type of cuisine.

name: Raisa Long
text: I've been here twice and each time was a pleasant experience. If you are in a rush, call in your order. The Happy Feelings Tropical Good Smoothie is the best. I've also tried the pulled pork sandwich which was surprisingly good if you're not vegan. Check them out for good healthy food.

name: Ellis
text: Very nice and welcoming people! Ordered previously through Grubhub and decided to go in store this time to order. Went to order cookies and left out with cookies and some cupcakes. I HIGHLY recommend!

name: Xena Saunders
text: It’s hard finding vegan food that’s well seasoned and flavorful, but by God this food was amazing. Seasoned perfectly- THE FLAVOR WAS IMMACULATE!! Not only was the food delicious, but the owner was such a sweet heart when we went to grab our food. We will definitely be back!!! Thank you so much!!!

name: Isabel Chen
text: My husband and I aren't vegan, but when we feel like our bodies need a "reset" we seek out vegan, vegetarian, or raw food. This place is a wonderful. Food was fresh and flavorful. We will be back for more.

name: Eddie Marroquin
text: Friendly atmosphere. Zen burger was epic! Never had anything like it. Jackfruit burrito was tasty. Kids chicken strips were delicious. Highly recommend.

name: Yakwanza Bantu
text:
Ate there one time...and kept going back, just being there makes you want to eat healthy....the environment is soothing, relaxing ,while you wait there's  great music playing  and the services is top shelf...wow.
Keep up the great work.

name: Sophia S
text: An amazing meal that will leave you smiling inside and out. We loved the fully loaded garden brat and whose health wouldn’t feel enriched while eating the millionaire’s burger! Great find and a very thoughtful and kind owner!

name: Theresa B Thomas
text: Great Service and Uniquely Delicious Meals and Healthy Drinks⭐💕

name: Carla Fergusson
text: Delicious food! I got the jackfruit sandwich and sweet potato fries. And chocolate chip cookies. The sauce that came with the fries was amazing! Good variety of menu options, really nice owner. Delicious cookies, I wish I’d bought more :) Thanks for a delicious meal!

name: Hot Damn
text: This was my first time trying them and everything was great! Love the BLT!

name: Julia H (Jules)
text: Love this place! Really good food! I got the jackfruit bbq sandwich! It was amazing and my friend got the millionaire burger and loved it! We’re going back ASAP!

name: Alexandra Shepherd
text: "Great food great deals awesome staff I love this place.

name: Kenneth R. Huff
text: After learning about this place from a friend, I had to try it out. I had the black bean burger and I have to say. It was the best burger I've had in a long time. The taste was out of this world! Also, the service was superb. I will be returning and I definitely recommend!

resp.text: Liberty Black Bean or Purple Black Bean are definitely to be considered!

name: Erika M
text: The food was very good! He was very nice and helpful while I was deciding what to order. I went with the burger and it was delicious! The food exceeded expectations and I will undoubtedly be returning. We're going to link back up and develop a meal plan and I'm going to eat Good Food To Be Hail for a week!

resp.text: Burgers are good, meals for a week engage the palate!

name: Timothy Casey
text: I cut meat out of my diet 7 days ago and never had a veggie burger before but I ordered the millionaire combo and it was fantastic! I know now that this will be a lot easier. David was very nice and helped me out on what to order knowing I was a beginner.

resp.text: Millionaires and Zen burgers are dynamic opportunities!

name: Aiden Shannon
text: Tried this spot already with a friend and I am hooked since then. I love the great vibes and delicious dishes and beverages. Keep up the good work.

name: Michael Busbin
text: It was an amazing burger.  The fries were out of this world.  Will be going here often!

name: Rachel Williams
text: We tried this at Vegan Fest in Avondale, so good definitely worth the trip. We tried 4 different menu options and had a pleasant experience beginning to end, furthered by how good we feel after eating! Owner was extremely nice and welcoming. Feels like your chilling at home while someone who loves you cooks. 110%

name: Kelli Vila-Rosa
text: Now I really should’ve taken a picture of my burger first, but I was so ready to give this burger a try I ate it! However I did share it with my niece, my mom, and my daughter as I’m trying to get our family on a better way of eating, a lifestyle change. I was so surprised and thrilled that they all said they liked it!! So from now on, well for now anyways, I’m going to treat myself to a different item once a week until I’ve tried everything on the menu and I will keep all of Bessemer posted.

name: Donreco Glaze
text: The Customer service was Great.. This Was By Far the Best Vegan Food I've Ever tasted in my Life...

name: Roderick Harris
text: My first was today, and it was awesome. I had the berry smoothies and kale veggie wrap that was oh soooo good!!!. Lots of healthy options and a lot of information if needed. I will definitely be going back ASAP!!!

resp.text: We have added some more healthy options, come see what we have to offer now!

name: KAMULAH KITT
text: Pleasantly surprised how good the healthy food was. Will definitely be coming back.

resp.text: We look forward to serving you the next time as well, thanks.

name: Batista ESDRAS
text: Excellent place good health results nice smoothies I would definitely send a friend there

resp.text: Appreciate your response and please do send your friends that are looking for healthy smoothies, thanks.

name: XclusivelyDoneEnt
text: Great place to enjoy REAL foood

name: Chef TréJ
text: Family owned business that is all about health! Had a fantastic vegan smoothie! Great place for Vegans!

resp.text: It truly is a great place for Vegan and for those that desire to just increase more raw plants in their diet, thanks.

name: Williamina Feagin
text: waited on quick. I found what I needed. A restaurant is inside this place

resp.text: We look forward to serving you in the future, thanks.

name: Vincent Flanagan
text: Very good and healthy food.Highly recommend.I will definitely be returning

resp.text: Good Health is in our name, it's our mission.  We look forward to serving you and others next time, thanks.

name: Scott Scroggins
text: Great food!  Delicious!

name: Amber
text: Good place to go and drink coffee. Also they have jewelry here! Definitely worth checking out. They also have CBD there but they keep it in the back, so it's still family friendly to take your kids there.

name: Alex Kirchner
text:
Awesome establishment I must say! However 3 star rating due to customer service and lack of knowledge (not by all). Have shopped here quite a bit and the female owner is an amazing human being, is very knowledgeable, and great to deal with! However the male (I assume owner) is not very nice and can be hard to deal with. Not to mention his lack of knowledge in the smoke shop. After 3 consistent negative interactions with him I only come in if I see he’s not working.

*reply*
Actually the main time I was referring to would be the first time I dealt with him. I came in looking for a 14mm quartz banger and was handed a 18mm glass bowl and was told that "that would do the trick" that was my first instance. I cannot control what happened with the broken pipes at the underground smoke shop in the back of the coffee shop when smoke and ash wasn't opened; that wasn't me. If there was an issue it should've been addressed. The "$200" piece I offered $20 for that may or may not of been china glass still only sold for $50  so my offer doesn't sound too unreasonable. The ID was my fault indeed, and I assumed since I had never** been ID'ed to purchase or enter the store that I wouldn't need one. Thank you for your past business.

resp.text:
Hey, Alex! If you could be more precise about your interactions, I could address your concerns more specifically. I was around the last few times you were in and I'm confused about what my partner could have done to frazzle you so much. Was it the time he asked for your ID per my new policy? Was it the time you were in and your friend dropped and broke two glass pipes and he didn't charge you for them or even make a big deal about it? Was it the time he wouldn't haggle a $200+ single blow recycler from Boulder down to $20 as if it were pressed China glass? Is that what's "hard to deal with"? You know me and you know I'm more than happy to address your concerns but I'd need to know more about your perception of his application of my policies. Stop on in and have a chat with me.
*Reply to your edit*
So, you decided to do this here instead of talking to me? Got it. I didn't realize you had access to all my sales and inventory information. Oh, wait. You don't. That's why everything you said is both incorrect and mean-spirited. It's cool. We like chill people here. I hope you find an even keel soon, son.

name: Darlene Adams
text: Great shop and wonderful staff.. very informative and helpful.. difinately will be back as a regular customer..

resp.text: Thank you!! It was awesome to meet you!

name: William Smith
text: Its the stuff legends are made of & always something new

name: Deb Ryan
text: I love this shop and the people who work there.  They took time to address all of my questions and help me understand the benefits and features of the products they offer.  I absolutely plan on returning.

name: Curtis Love
text: I highly recommend smoke and ash for your cigar and smoke needs. They are incredibly friendly and the prices are extremely reasonable. All my pieces are worth every penny. I'll continue to shop there because they make you feel like family and are my new favorite shop.

name: David Allen
text: Great coffee. Awesome customer service. Friendly people. Will definitely revisit this store in the future. Thanks

resp.text: Thanks! It was great to meet you!

name: M Moore
text: Friendliest cigar/smoke store in town. The best customer service and the best prices. I will continue to shop here!

name: Cody Cooper
text: Never open even under normal business hours. Don't post hours if you can't commit.

resp.text: We are closed for renovations and have posted our plans across all our pages. We have also provided ways to contact us at our new location for nearly immediate assistance; many of our regular clientelle do this on a regular basis. I'm sure you've been disappointed to not have access to our products. We will be liquidating our stock in a few weeks as we move forward to bigger things. You can find more info on our Facebook page.

name: Savannah Scott
text: Great prices, wonderful staff, lovely products

resp.text: Thanks Savannah! We love taking care of you!

name: B.J Killings
text: Nice ppl

name: Justin Landry
text: Very knowledgeable staff very friendly good selection of quality supplements!

name: Myrtle Tart
text: Took my daughter to this shop. They do were closing 2 of the staff was locking the door. When they saw her they went back inside to let her make a purchase. Not many people have staff so accommodating. Thank you Herbs and More

name: Selena Sevy
text: The ladies there were extremely helpful and very knowledgeable.

name: Tonya Ramos
text: Excellent service from Gwen and her family!

name: Ha Ha
text: A neat shop, very friendly staff!

name: Paula R LaCroix
text: Most cold, heartless, stuck up, snobby staff ive ever come across in my entire life. I was having a terrible day and to add to it I ran outta gas and broke down in their parking lot. I made it into a spot to safely be outta people's way and try to call around to friends and family for help. As i sit there with my boyfriend crying and breaking down hoping that someone would answer back and come to our rescue, 2 ladys approach us and ask us what we were doing. My boyfriend tries to explain we ran outta gas and broke down and we were just trying to call for help they point at a sign that says "Herbs and More parking ONLY violators will be towed at own expense." And tell us "we would hate to have you towed so you better leave before we call the tow truck." I instantly broke down and started balling and my boyfriend was shocked and angry at the complete lack of humanity. We managed to get our car to start up one more time to make it across the street so we didnt get towed or the law called on us for simply breaking down. These Herbs and More employees have no humamity, no heart and no compassion! If thats the kind of employees this business has then their owners should be ashamed of themselves! To see people crying and in trouble like that and be so cold and careless is terrible. Herbs and More you will NEVER have me or my families respect or business!!!

name: Glenda David
text: Always very helpful

name: Ervin Hambrick
text: They have a lot of natural medicine
